name: Make 3D Mask 4 IJ
short_description:
User loads the image where an object will be identified in a few cross-sections.  User users one of a few tools (including LiveWire) to identify object.  3D Object output as an Image Stack.  Can be converted into a tesselated 3D object using Airway Morph at (https://sourceforge.net/projects/airwaymorpholog/) 

Uses ImageJ
download .jar file, place into plugins folder, restart ImageJ
summary: Makes a 3D Object in ImageJ using Cross Section Interpolation
